title: What We Learned
subtitle: The key takeaways from our journey.

leftBullets.title: Focus is Foundational
leftBullets.description: It's not just for `TextField`s. It's the core of every non-touch user experience.

leftBullets.title: Think in Scopes
leftBullets.description: `FocusScope` is the essential tool for structuring a complex TV UI into logical, manageable zones.

leftBullets.title: Policies Are Your Superpower
leftBullets.description: Don't fight the framework. Extend `FocusTraversalPolicy` to create elegant, reusable navigation logic.

leftBullets.title: Don't Forget to Polish
leftBullets.description: A great experience is in the details. Manually handling scrolling and state is what separates good from great.
